website_summaries.verdict: Whether you need to keep your kiddo's drinks warm or cold, this child-friendly YETI has features designed especially for little ones.
pros: Offers a scaled-down 12oz size and large handle that make it perfect for smaller hands
Cap with built-in straw is easy for kids to use and minimizes spills
Just as useful at maintaining beverage temperatures as adult-size Ramblers
cons: Seal may wear out prematurely, resulting in leaks
Rare reports of dents upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Bought for my 15 month old because her plastic ones kept getting scratched from being dropped. She can’t open it on her own, and it leaks if the spout is open and laid down. If closed it doesn’t leak at all. Keeps everything cold!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: One hydrated kid and a happy mom!
customer_reviews.text: I got the seafoam color and it is beautiful. My daughter loves it and it helps her stay hydrated. We use it for going outside in the Texas heat. So far, so good. It is not totally spill proof with the straw for my two year old but it's not enough to bother me considering it keeps her water cold and I've read reviews on similar top selling cups and it seems that is to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: BlueMist

customer_reviews.title: Get a Yeti!
customer_reviews.text: The Yeti is so worth the cost. I bought my 6 year old granddaughter a Yeti for her 1st camping trip with the grandmas. She always wants her water cold! Her mom has one and loves it. It was a success on the trip. A week after getting home she accidentally left the Yeti on the ground behind a car. Yup it was run over. As you can see by the picture there are a few scratches but it works great. I Don’t know of any other thermo cup that can withstand being run over by a car. Guess what all the grandkids are getting for Christmas?
customer_reviews.author: LYNN M. JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an insulated tumbler with a metal (not painted) bottom, on the smaller size. I'm an adult but I don't like lugging around 20oz water bottles. This fits the bill. I hesitated due to the price, but this should theoretically last me forever. I'll replace the straws or lid if that is ever needed, but the body should really last me as long as I need it. It's solid, durable, and you can tell the quality through the feel. I'm not necessarily into name brands, but I do think there's a difference between this product and similar cheaper options.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah T

customer_reviews.title: Great kids cup
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves her Yeti Rambler Jr. I bought it for her when she was 22 months and she was able to open it and close it on her own. I love that it will keep ice for hours - we boat often and needed a durable cup that would stay cold. Her 18 month old buddy can’t open it so you may have to wait until your kiddo is closer to 2. This will definitely be a cup we’ll be able to keep and utilize for years.
customer_reviews.author: Jilian

customer_reviews.title: great bottle! but heavy and not leakproof
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made bottle, which of course it's expected. my 2 yr old loves it and can handle it, open/close the spout by herself easily. It is heavier than I thought it would be. I have a similar water bottle (from hydroflask) that is bigger but lighter than this one. It is not leakproof at all. I have a handbag full of water if anyone wants to know :/
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Great except doesn’t fit in cup holders.
customer_reviews.text: Kid friendly handle and use. Warning to parents that it is only leak proof when closed, quite heavy, and most importantly DOES NOT FIT IN CAR SEAT OR STROLLER CUP HOLDERS. That being said, we use it every day and our daughter loves it. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R Waychoff IV

customer_reviews.title: Keep on my nightstand, totally leak proof!
customer_reviews.text: Wantes something for by my bed that wouldent spill all over... this thing is spillproof and came in a lovely seafoam green that matches my room. Its dishwasher safe which makes it even better ! Must have!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Yeti for the Win
customer_reviews.text: We love yeti products in our household. It was the perfect size for my six year old. She is allowed to have a water bottle all day at school and this works great to keep her drink cold all day. She likes the chance to be like her entire family with her own yeti. I would love to see similar products in kid sizes from yeti.
customer_reviews.author: A.Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I’m only giving it two starts because this cup leaks beyond belief. I got it so it can keep drinks cool longer & as soon as I give it to my daughter and it tilts , there goes all her drink all over her and her car seat. It’s ridiculous. Other than that it is awesome. Maybe for an adult that knows that the lid should be closed right after drinking
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Nice but leaks
customer_reviews.text: Normally i love all of yeti’s products and we have so many other cups and more things but this cup isn’t really practical for kids. It leaks no matter how tight it is and the lid completely closed. Two days in a row it has soaked my child’s bookbag. It’s not overfilled either you turn it and it leaks from the screw top.
customer_reviews.author: Kiley

customer_reviews.title: Keeps water cold all day
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several of these bottles for my kids to take to school. I fill them up with water and ice in the morning and they still have ice in them after dinner time. I find that my kids drink more water when it's cold. I highly recommend. We have 4 cups in our house now.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah A.

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Unless the straw is pressed down this thing leaks like crazy. Bad messy design for kids
customer_reviews.author: lowlowheyhey

customer_reviews.title: Nice but quite heavy.
customer_reviews.text: My 9 yr old is a Big water drinker and prefers to take two water bottles to school every day. We have many different kinds. We like the Yeti but it is too heavy to take to school or most places. So it is her home water bottle 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to seal.
customer_reviews.text: I have it a 4 because I have trouble with the top. Difficult to get rings to match and close. Otherwise, I like a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rugged!
customer_reviews.text: Toddler loves it! Does leak if left on its side as it’s not a “sippy cup” Get a straw brush so you can clean the mouth piece. Love the Yeti!
customer_reviews.author: Matt3322

customer_reviews.title: It’s a yeti!
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my kid. A true yeti fan in our house
customer_reviews.author: Janis L Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great thermos. Daughter loves it. Weight is good and keeps items cold. It does spill periodically when you turn it upside down to drink (my little one is crazy) but not too bad as I know the model wasn’t made to be used in such a way.
customer_reviews.author: jacob norton

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her yeti. She's 9 yrs old and it's a perfect size for her, not too small and not too big and heavy. Great quality. Would definitely purchase again in other colors. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Crazy to spend so much on a toddlers cup but it is WORTH IT
customer_reviews.author: Kristina D.

customer_reviews.title: No straw included
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and Yeti water bottles in general. However, this will only get 2 stars because ours did not come with a straw or any original packaging, sticker logo, etc. Not sure why.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Geiser

customer_reviews.title: Quality cup
customer_reviews.text: With spout clouded it doesn’t leak, a little drink comes out the straw when tipped upside down when the spout is open. Cup is easy to clean and doesn’t seem to have any books that are hard to clean. Seems pretty durable and worth the extra few bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Best water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Yeti water bottles are amazing. They keep drinks very cold and best of all are dishwasher safe! Bought this one for my 14 month old niece- she had no problem figuring out how to drink from it.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Lovera

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a toddler!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my daughters water cold all day! Easy to clean. No leaks. Perfect for the beach and outdoor fun, too! Comes with two replacement straws. So appreciative!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy bottle. It did leak a small amount of water out when laying in its side.
customer_reviews.author: NEAL WARTH

customer_reviews.title: Great cups!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this Yeti. All 3 of my kids under age 10 have one and we love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Product is perfect bought for my granddaughter 22 months she loves is
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Everything I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for daughters to have at school. Fits perfectly in their bookbags. Keeps their water cold all day. So far, no leaks!! Great size for them to carry. They love the handle!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for school
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase of the school year. It’s so durable, keeps water cold all day and never leaks. I had been buying at 3 water bottles during the school year for my 7-year old. I’d much rather buy one high-quality bottle that will last all year long.
customer_reviews.author: MrsB918

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: They are incredibly rugged for the little ones water bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela calcagno

customer_reviews.title: Yeti quality in a kids water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Ours have been beaten up already. By far the strongest and sturdiest kids water bottle we’ve had.
customer_reviews.author: andrew gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: the perfect water bottle
customer_reviews.text: My little girls love these water bottles. They bring them to school each day. They are incredibly durable and a pretty color. I feel like we have these for years and years!
customer_reviews.author: Angela C.

customer_reviews.title: Finally a Yetti owned
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! The only thing that threw me off is the handle it doesn’t move which is okay though.
customer_reviews.author: Enna Dawkins

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Supposed to be leak proof. But very obviously spills. I even tried to adjust the straw.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea B

customer_reviews.title: Yeti
customer_reviews.text: My teenage daughter loved this Yeti! It says it’s for smaller children, but she said this was the perfect size and is spill proof...which we know most teenagers need!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Part of a toddlers life.. :)
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this water bottle...and it’s also pretty easy to clean...she loves carrying it around and drinking out of it...I kind of wish it wasn’t so heavy but I understand why it would be...also she has dropped it many times and it’s still staying strong 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable cups for young kids who have a tendency to leave their cup around for a while. Stays cold for so long. Great looking as well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a yeti so you know it’s good
customer_reviews.text: My little one loves this thing, now she is just like her mama!! Quality yeti product once again.
customer_reviews.author: krb25

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps liquid cold all day! Great product!! Especially for kids :)
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like that fact that water pours from the spout when it’s open and not facing upright. I seem to only have this problem with one of two of these that we purchased. For the money it shouldn’t leak.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kid Tested and Approved!
customer_reviews.text: Great for school and weekends, doesn’t leak when closed. Water will pour out if mouth piece is open and it tilts. Very durable. We own two of these bottles for our 5yr old. Will keep ice for an 8-hr day.
customer_reviews.author: Imad S.

customer_reviews.title: Best cup for my 3 year old!
customer_reviews.text: We use this cup everyday! All the other ones will be hitting the trash can and cleaning out my cabinets... best part is it’s dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids on the go
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids lunch boxes and for travel. Keeps drinks cold all day.
customer_reviews.author: Adizz

customer_reviews.title: Yeti review
customer_reviews.text: Heavy bottle but very sturdy. We’ve been using this at a water bottle for my toddler at daycare. She really likes it. Only thing is it will leak if it’s pointed downward.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect school accessory!
customer_reviews.text: Great for school! Holds up to the abuse of 3rd and 1st graders!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Great Christmas present for little girls who play sports! Small enough to be put in a backpack and take to school for lunch as well! I also monogrammed them and they came out great!
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: My 5 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: This keeps water ice cold all day. My daughter drinks more water than she did before she got this.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Palomo

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this yeti! I went fishing and it had no leaking at all.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and washes well. My 5 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Durable bottle. Does dribble some if you leave it open on its side.
customer_reviews.author: WP

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers. Meets expectations
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, easy to clean. Keeps liquids hot or cold as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: NShiv

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: When you spend so much money on a water bottle you would expect not to get a spill all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is durable and leak proof. Perfect as it doesn't leak in your bag either. I bought several.
customer_reviews.author: Kendal Berry-Tripp

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my toddler. She loves this water bottle! It is very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Lott

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this Yeti Rambler, our favorite so far for our 4yo
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey D.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: They are great for the kids in sports Vacation And Anything else you want to do it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disney keeper
customer_reviews.text: We used this cup in Disney World for our 2 year old !! She loved it, kept water cold all day as needed !
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Chaussey

customer_reviews.title: Could be used as a club.
customer_reviews.text: She loved it until she hit herself in the face with it. We still like it though...
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. Child-resistant. Got another one for my second kid
customer_reviews.author: lauren james mccollum

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: color is very pretty, my niece loves it, it was a birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: MA

product_meta.title: YETI Rambler Jr. 12 oz Kids Bottle, with Straw Cap
feature_bullets: YETI kids need a bottle that can keep up. Introducing Rambler Jr. - a small-and-mighty kids bottle over-engineered for your little wild ones
Dishwasher Safe - As a well-deserved convenience to you, we made sure both the bottle and cap are dishwasher safe (because one less chore sounds nice)
18/8 Stainless Steel - Withstands all dents and drops and BPA-Free so they can safely sip without a worry in the world
No Sweat Design - Keeps their hands dry - critical when summiting the jungle gym, and the Duracoat color won’t crack or peel
Straw Cap - Ultra leak & shatter-resistant ideal for impromptu rowdiness. Recess is no match for the Straw Cap

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
